Add 2 chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 5. Add 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste. Stir and cook for 2 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 1/2 cup coconut milk and cook for 5 minutes. 2. Add the prawns and cook for 5-7 minutes or until they are cooked through. 3. Add 1 tbsp tamarind paste and cook for 2 more minutes. 4. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot with rice.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, PEAS, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, GARAM MASALA, CUMIN, FENNEL SEEDS, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, CORIANDER POWDER, SALT, OIL, SAMOSA PASTRY SHEETS
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp fennel seeds, and let them splutter. 3. Add 1 chopped onion, 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, and saute until golden brown. 4. Add 1/2 cup peas, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp garam masala, and salt to taste. Cook for 5 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add the mashed potatoes to the mixture, stir well, and cook for 5 more minutes. 2. Let the filling cool. 3. Stuff the samosa pastry sheets with the filling and fold them into triangular shapes. 4. Deep fry the samosas in hot oil until golden brown. Serve hot with tamarind chutney or green chutney.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARAM MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, CORIANDER POWDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 chopped onion, and saute until golden brown. 3. Add 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1-2 chopped green chilies, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp coriander powder, and salt to taste. Stir for 2 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add the mashed potatoes to the pan, stir and cook for 5 minutes. 2. Let the mixture cool, then shape it into round or flat tikkis. 3. Shallow fry the tikkis in oil until golden brown on both sides. Serve with green chutney and tamarind chutney.

INGREDIENTS: REFINED FLOUR, MOONG DAL, ONION, CUMIN, CORIANDER POWDER, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, FENNEL SEEDS, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1/2 cup lentils for 30 minutes. 2. Grind the lentils into a coarse paste. 3. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp fennel seeds, and let them splutter. 4. Add 1 chopped onion, saute until golden brown. 5. Add 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp garam masala, and salt to taste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add the lentil paste to the pan, stir well and cook for 5 minutes. 2. Let the filling cool. 3. Roll the dough into small balls, stuff with the filling, and form into round shapes. 4. Deep fry the kachoris in hot oil until golden brown. Serve with green chutney or tamarind chutney.

INGREDIENTS: PANI PURI SHELLS, POTATO, CHICKPEAS, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, MINT LEAVES, CORIANDER, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, CUMIN POWDER, BLACK SALT, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Boil 1/2 cup chickpeas and mash them. 3. Mix the mashed potatoes and chickpeas with 1 tsp cumin powder, 1/2 tsp black salt, and salt to taste. 4. Fill the puris with the mixture.
Cooking Steps: 1. For the water, blend a handful of mint leaves, coriander leaves, 1-2 green chilies, 1 tsp ginger, and tamarind chutney. Add 1/2 tsp cumin powder, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste. 2. Fill each puri with the flavored water and serve immediately.

INGREDIENTS: PANI PURI SHELLS, POTATO, ONION, TOMATO, SEV, GREEN CHUTNEY, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, CHAAT MASALA, CORIANDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Finely chop 1 onion and 1 tomato. 3. Spread the puris on a plate and top with mashed potatoes, chopped onions, and tomatoes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Drizzle green chutney, tamarind chutney, and sprinkle sev, chaat masala, and salt. 2. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve immediately.

INGREDIENTS: PUFFED RICE, SEV, ONION, TOMATO, CUCUMBER, POMEGRANATE, CORIANDER, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, GREEN CHUTNEY, CHAAT MASALA, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. In a large bowl, mix 2 cups puffed rice, 1/2 cup sev, 1 chopped onion, 1 chopped tomato, and 1/2 chopped cucumber. 2. Add 1/4 cup pomegranate and chopped coriander leaves.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 2 tbsp tamarind chutney, 2 tbsp green chutney, 1/2 tsp chaat masala, and salt to taste. Mix well and serve immediately.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, WHITE PEAS, ONION, GINGER, GARLIC, GREEN CHILIES, TOMATO, CHAAT MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, GREEN CHUTNEY, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1/2 cup white peas overnight and boil them. 2. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 3. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 chopped onion, 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, and saute until golden brown. 4. Add 2 chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 5. Add 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add the boiled peas to the pan and cook for 10 minutes. 2. Shape the mashed potatoes into patties and shallow fry them. 3. Serve the patties topped with the ragda and chutneys. Garnish with chopped onions, coriander leaves, and sev.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, TOMATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, PAV BHAJI MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, CORIANDER POWDER, CUMIN POWDER, BUTTER, PAV, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Heat 2 tbsp butter in a pan, add 1 chopped onion, 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, and saute until golden brown. 3. Add 2 chopped tomatoes, 1 chopped green chili, and cook until soft. 4. Add 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, and salt to taste. Stir for 2 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add the mashed potatoes and mix well. 2. Add 1 tsp pav bhaji masala and 1/2 cup water. Let it cook for 10 minutes. 3. Toast the pavs with butter and serve with the bhaji, topped with chopped onions and coriander.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, CORIANDER POWDER, PAV, CHUTNEY, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 chopped onion, and saute until golden brown. 3. Add 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1-2 chopped green chilies, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, and salt to taste. Stir well.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add the mashed potatoes to the mixture, stir and cook for 5 minutes. 2. Let the mixture cool and shape it into round balls. 3. Dip the balls in a batter made of flour and deep fry them. 4. Serve the vada inside pav with chutneys.

INGREDIENTS: ONION, GRAM FLOUR, RICE FLOUR, RED CHILI POWDER, CUMIN, CORIANDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Slice 2 onions thinly and place them in a bowl. 2. Add 1 cup besan, 1/4 cup rice flour, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, and salt to taste. 3. Add chopped coriander leaves and mix well.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add water little by little to make a batter. 2. Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the batter in small portions until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, GRAM FLOUR, RICE FLOUR, RED CHILI POWDER, CUMIN, TURMERIC, CORIANDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Add 1 cup besan, 1/4 cup rice flour, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, 1/2 tsp turmeric, and salt to taste. 3. Add chopped coriander leaves and mix well.
Cooking Steps: 1. Shape the mixture into round or oval balls. 2. Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the pakoras until golden brown. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: BREAD, POTATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, CORIANDER POWDER, SALT, GRAM FLOUR, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 chopped onion, and saute until golden brown. 3. Add 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1-2 chopped green chilies, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp coriander powder, and salt to taste. Stir well.
Cooking Steps: 1. Stuff the bread slices with the mashed potato mixture. 2. Dip the stuffed bread in a besan batter and deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: PANEER, GRAM FLOUR, RICE FLOUR, RED CHILI POWDER, CUMIN, CORIANDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Cut 200g paneer into cubes. 2. In a bowl, mix 1 cup besan, 1/4 cup rice flour, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, and salt to taste. 3. Add chopped coriander leaves and mix.
Cooking Steps: 1. Dip the paneer cubes in the batter and deep fry them in hot oil until golden brown. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: SPINACH, GRAM FLOUR, RICE FLOUR, RED CHILI POWDER, CUMIN, TURMERIC, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Wash and chop a bunch of spinach leaves. 2. In a bowl, add 1 cup besan, 1/4 cup rice flour, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp cumin seeds, 1/2 tsp turmeric, and salt to taste. 3. Add the chopped spinach leaves and mix well.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add water little by little to make a batter. 2. Heat oil in a pan and deep fry spoonfuls of the batter until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: PANI PURI SHELLS, POTATO, YOGURT, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, GREEN CHUTNEY, CHAAT MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, CORIANDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Fill the puris with mashed potatoes and arrange them on a plate.
Cooking Steps: 1. Drizzle yogurt, tamarind chutney, and green chutney on the puris. 2. Sprinkle chaat masala, red chili powder, and salt. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve immediately.

INGREDIENTS: URAD DAL, YOGURT, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, GREEN CHUTNEY, CHAAT MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup urad dal overnight. 2. Grind the soaked dal into a smooth batter. 3. Heat oil in a pan, shape the batter into small balls, and deep fry them.
Cooking Steps: 1. Soak the fried balls in water for 10 minutes. 2. Squeeze out excess water and arrange them on a plate. 3. Drizzle yogurt, tamarind chutney, green chutney, and sprinkle chaat masala, red chili powder, and salt. Serve immediately.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, GREEN CHUTNEY, CHAAT MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and cut them into small cubes. 2. In a bowl, mix the potato cubes with tamarind chutney, green chutney, chaat masala, red chili powder, and salt to taste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve immediately.

INGREDIENTS: CHICKPEAS, ONION, TOMATO, CUCUMBER, GREEN CHILIES, TAMARIND CHUTNEY, GREEN CHUTNEY, CHAAT MASALA, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1/2 cup chickpeas overnight and boil them. 2. Chop 1 onion, 1 tomato, and 1 cucumber. 3. Mix the boiled chickpeas with the chopped vegetables.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add tamarind chutney, green chutney, chaat masala, and salt to taste. Mix well and serve immediately.

INGREDIENTS: CORN KERNELS, BUTTER, RED CHILI POWDER, CHAAT MASALA, LEMON, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 2 cups corn kernels. 2. Heat 1 tbsp butter in a pan, add the boiled corn, and saute for 2-3 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Sprinkle red chili powder, chaat masala, and salt to taste. Squeeze lemon juice over the corn and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, CARROT, GREEN PEAS, CORN KERNELS, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, CORIANDER POWDER, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, SALT, BREAD CRUMBS, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Boil 1/2 cup green peas and 1/2 cup corn kernels. 3. Grate 1 carrot and chop 1 onion and 1-2 green chilies. 4. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, saute the onions, ginger, and chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add the boiled potatoes, peas, corn, grated carrot, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp turmeric, and salt to taste. Mix well. 2. Shape the mixture into cutlets, coat with bread crumbs, and shallow fry in oil. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: BREAD, POTATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CORIANDER POWDER, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 chopped onion, and saute until golden brown. 3. Add 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1-2 chopped green chilies, 1/2 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, and salt to taste. Stir well.
Cooking Steps: 1. Stuff the bread slices with the mashed potato mixture. 2. Roll the bread slices, dip them in batter, and deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: SPINACH, PANEER, POTATO, PEAS, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, CORIANDER POWDER, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, BREAD CRUMBS, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 4-5 potatoes and mash them. 2. Blanch a bunch of spinach leaves and chop them finely. 3. Boil 1/2 cup green peas. 4. Grate 100g paneer and chop 1 onion and 1-2 green chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a pan, sauté the onions and ginger-garlic paste. 2. Add the chopped spinach, peas, and mashed potatoes, and cook for 5 minutes. 3. Shape the mixture into kebabs, coat with bread crumbs, and shallow fry until golden brown. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: POHA, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, PEAS, POTATO, LEMON, SALT, TURMERIC, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Wash 2 cups poha under running water and set aside. 2. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add 1 tsp mustard seeds, curry leaves, and chopped green chilies. 3. Add 1 chopped onion and saute until translucent. 4. Add 1 diced potato and peas, and cook until soft.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add poha to the pan, sprinkle turmeric and salt, mix well, and cook for 2-3 minutes. 2. Squeeze lemon juice and serve hot with coriander leaves.

INGREDIENTS: SEMOLINA, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, PEAS, CARROT, SALT, OIL, WATER
Preparation Steps: 1. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and chopped green chilies. 2. Add 1 chopped onion, saute until soft. 3. Add 1/2 cup chopped carrot and 1/4 cup peas.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 1 cup semolina (rava) and roast it for 2-3 minutes. 2. Boil 2 cups of water, add it to the semolina, and stir. 3. Cook for 3-4 minutes, then serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, URAD DAL, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup rice and 1/4 cup urad dal overnight. 2. Grind the rice and dal into a smooth batter. 3. Let the batter ferment for 12-24 hours.
Cooking Steps: 1. Grease idli molds and pour the batter into them. 2. Steam for 10-12 minutes, then serve hot with chutney and sambar.

INGREDIENTS: SEMOLINA, YOGURT, MUSTARD SEEDS, GREEN CHILIES, CURRY LEAVES, CASHEWS, SALT, WATER, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, green chilies, curry leaves, and cashews. 2. Add 1 cup semolina (rava) and roast for 2-3 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/4 cup water, and salt, and mix into a smooth batter. 2. Grease idli molds, pour the batter, and steam for 10-12 minutes. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, URAD DAL, POTATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, TAMARIND PASTE, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup rice and 1/4 cup urad dal overnight. 2. Grind into a smooth batter, and let it ferment for 12-24 hours.
Cooking Steps: 1. Prepare a filling by sautéing boiled potatoes, onions, green chilies, mustard seeds, curry leaves, tamarind paste, and salt. 2. Make thin dosa from the batter, fill with the potato mixture, and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, URAD DAL, SALT
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup rice and 1/4 cup urad dal overnight. 2. Grind into a smooth batter, and let it ferment for 12-24 hours.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat a griddle, pour a ladle of batter, and spread into a thin circle. 2. Cook until crispy and serve hot with chutney and sambar.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, URAD DAL, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, CARROT, CURRY LEAVES, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup rice and 1/4 cup urad dal overnight. 2. Grind into a smooth batter and let it ferment for 12-24 hours.
Cooking Steps: 1. Pour the batter onto a heated griddle and top with chopped onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and grated carrots. 2. Cook until crispy and serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: GREEN GRAM, RICE, GINGER, GREEN CHILIES, ONION, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup green gram overnight. 2. Grind it along with 1/4 cup rice, ginger, and green chilies into a smooth batter.
Cooking Steps: 1. Pour the batter onto a heated griddle, spread into a thin circle, and cook until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: WHEAT FLOUR, FENUGREEK LEAVES, CUMIN, RED CHILI POWDER, TURMERIC, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. In a bowl, mix 2 cups wheat flour, 1/2 cup chopped fenugreek leaves, 1 tsp cumin seeds, 1/2 tsp red chili powder, 1/2 tsp turmeric, and salt.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add water to make a smooth dough. 2. Roll into small balls, flatten, and cook on a griddle with oil until golden brown. Serve hot with yogurt or chutney.

INGREDIENTS: EGGS, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, TOMATO, GINGER, CORIANDER, TURMERIC, SALT, BUTTER
Preparation Steps: 1. Heat 1 tbsp butter in a pan, saute 1 chopped onion, 1 chopped green chili, and 1 tsp ginger. 2. Add 2 chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Cooking Steps: 1. Crack 2 eggs into the pan, stir continuously, and cook for 2-3 minutes. 2. Add turmeric, salt, and coriander leaves. Serve hot with bread or pav.

INGREDIENTS: MOONG DAL, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, CORIANDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup moong dal for 2-3 hours. 2. Grind the soaked dal into a smooth batter, adding chopped onions, green chilies, and salt.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat a griddle, pour a ladle of batter, and spread into a thin circle. 2. Cook until golden brown, flipping if needed. Serve hot with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, COCONUT, SALT, WATER
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup rice for 4-5 hours. 2. Grind rice with 1/4 cup coconut into a smooth batter, adding salt.
Cooking Steps: 1. Pour the batter onto a heated griddle and spread into a thin layer. 2. Cook for 2-3 minutes, then serve hot with chutney or curry.

INGREDIENTS: CHICKPEAS, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, TAMARIND, CHOLE MASALA, SALT, FLOUR, YOGURT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup chickpeas overnight and boil. 2. Heat oil in a pan, saute onions, tomatoes, green chilies, ginger, and garlic.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add chole masala, tamarind paste, boiled chickpeas, and salt. Cook until thick. 2. For bhature, mix flour, yogurt, and salt, knead into dough, and deep fry. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: WHEAT FLOUR, POTATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, CORIANDER POWDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 2-3 potatoes and mash them. 2. Heat oil in a pan, saute chopped onions, green chilies, cumin seeds, and coriander powder.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add mashed potatoes, salt, and cook for 5 minutes. 2. For poori dough, mix wheat flour and salt, knead into a smooth dough. 3. Roll out small balls and deep fry until golden brown. Serve hot with the potato mixture.

INGREDIENTS: MILK POWDER, ALL PURPOSE FLOUR, BAKING SODA, GHEE, MILK, SUGAR, WATER, CARDAMOM, ROSE WATER
Preparation Steps: 1. In a bowl, mix 1 cup milk powder, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, and a pinch of baking soda. 2. Gradually add 1/4 cup milk and knead into a smooth dough. 3. Shape the dough into small balls.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat ghee in a pan. Fry the balls on low heat until golden brown. 2. In another pan, prepare sugar syrup with 1 cup sugar, 1 cup water, cardamom, and rose water. 3. Soak the fried balls in the syrup for 1-2 hours before serving.

INGREDIENTS: FULL_FAT MILK, LEMON, SUGAR, WATER, CARDAMOM
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 1 liter of full-fat milk. 2. Add lemon juice to curdle the milk. 3. Strain the curds and wash the chhena with cold water. 4. Knead the chhena into a smooth dough.
Cooking Steps: 1. Roll the chhena into small balls. 2. Boil water with sugar and cardamom to prepare the syrup. 3. Add the balls to the syrup and cook for 10-15 minutes until they double in size. 4. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: ALL PURPOSE FLOUR, CORNSTARCH, YOGURT, BAKING POWDER, SAFFRON, SUGAR, WATER, ROSE WATER, GHEE
Preparation Steps: 1. Mix 1 cup flour, 1 tbsp cornstarch, a pinch of baking powder, and 1 tbsp yogurt with water to form a thick batter. 2. Let it rest for 15 minutes. 3. Prepare sugar syrup by boiling 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup water, saffron, and rose water.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat ghee in a pan. Fill the batter into a piping bag. 2. Squeeze the batter into spiral shapes and fry until crispy. 3. Dip the fried jalebis in the warm sugar syrup for 1-2 minutes and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, SAFFRON, ALMONDS, CASHEWS, RAISINS
Preparation Steps: 1. Wash 1/2 cup rice and soak it for 10 minutes. 2. Boil 4 cups milk and add soaked rice. 3. Cook on low heat until rice is soft and milk thickens. 4. Add sugar, cardamom, and saffron.
Cooking Steps: 1. Stir occasionally and cook until the pudding reaches a creamy consistency. 2. Garnish with almonds, cashews, and raisins. 3. Serve chilled or warm.

INGREDIENTS: CARROT, MILK, SUGAR, GHEE, CARDAMOM, ALMONDS, CASHEWS
Preparation Steps: 1. Grate 3-4 carrots. 2. Heat 1 tbsp ghee in a pan, saute the grated carrots for 5-6 minutes. 3. Add 2 cups milk and cook until the milk is absorbed.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add sugar and cardamom powder. Stir and cook for 10-15 minutes until it thickens. 2. Garnish with almonds and cashews. 3. Serve warm.

INGREDIENTS: GRAM FLOUR, GHEE, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, CASHEWS, RAISINS
Preparation Steps: 1. Heat 1 cup ghee in a pan, add 1 cup gram flour, and roast on low heat for 10-12 minutes until golden brown and aromatic. 2. Add cardamom powder.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add sugar and mix well. 2. Once the mixture cools slightly, shape it into round balls. 3. Garnish with cashews and raisins. 4. Let it cool completely before serving.

INGREDIENTS: RICE FLOUR, JAGGERY, COCONUT, GHEE, CARDAMOM, WATER
Preparation Steps: 1. In a pan, heat 1/2 cup ghee, add 1/2 cup grated coconut, and 1/2 cup jaggery. Cook until the jaggery melts. 2. Add cardamom powder for flavor.
Cooking Steps: 1. Prepare a dough by mixing rice flour with warm water. 2. Shape the dough into small cups. 3. Stuff the coconut-jaggery mixture inside the dough, and shape it into a modak. 4. Steam the modaks for 10-12 minutes. 5. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: GRAM FLOUR, GHEE, SUGAR, WATER
Preparation Steps: 1. In a pan, heat 1 cup ghee. 2. Add 1/2 cup gram flour and roast until golden brown.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup water to the pan and cook until the mixture thickens. 2. Once it reaches a fudge-like consistency, pour it into a greased tray and allow it to set. 3. Cut into pieces and serve.

INGREDIENTS: YOGURT, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, SAFFRON, PISTACHIOS, ALMONDS
Preparation Steps: 1. Strain 2 cups yogurt to remove excess water. 2. Add 1/2 cup sugar, cardamom powder, and saffron to the yogurt and mix well.
Cooking Steps: 1. Garnish with pistachios and almonds. 2. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: FULL_FAT MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, SAFFRON, ALMONDS, PISTACHIOS
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 1 liter of full-fat milk. 2. Reduce the milk by half on low heat, stirring frequently. 3. Add 1/2 cup sugar, cardamom, and saffron for flavor.
Cooking Steps: 1. Continue to simmer until the milk thickens. 2. Garnish with almonds and pistachios. 3. Serve warm or chilled.

INGREDIENTS: FULL_FAT MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, ALMONDS, PISTACHIOS, SAFFRON
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 1 liter milk, and reduce it to 1/3rd of the original quantity. 2. Add sugar, cardamom, and saffron to the milk.
Cooking Steps: 1. Pour the mixture into kulfi molds and freeze for 6 hours or overnight. 2. Garnish with chopped almonds and pistachios before serving.

INGREDIENTS: ALL PURPOSE FLOUR, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, MILK, GHEE
Preparation Steps: 1. Mix 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup sugar, and cardamom powder. 2. Add milk to make a thick batter.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat ghee in a pan. Pour spoonfuls of the batter into the ghee and fry until golden. 2. Serve with sugar syrup or honey.

INGREDIENTS: GRATED COCONUT, SUGAR, MILK, GHEE, CARDAMOM
Preparation Steps: 1. In a pan, heat 1 cup grated coconut with 1/2 cup sugar. 2. Add 1/2 cup milk and cook until the mixture thickens.
Cooking Steps: 1. Grease a tray and pour the mixture into it. 2. Let it set for 30 minutes before cutting into pieces. 3. Garnish with cardamom and serve.

INGREDIENTS: ALMONDS, GHEE, MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1/2 cup almonds in hot water for 10 minutes. 2. Peel the almonds and grind into a paste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat 1/2 cup ghee in a pan, add almond paste and cook until aromatic. 2. Add milk, sugar, and cardamom. Cook until it thickens. 3. Serve warm.

INGREDIENTS: MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, SAFFRON, CHHENA, ROSE WATER
Preparation Steps: 1. Prepare rasgullas using milk and lemon juice. 2. In another pan, boil milk with sugar and cardamom. Add saffron and rose water.
Cooking Steps: 1. Soak the rasgullas in the milk syrup. 2. Garnish with chopped pistachios and serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: WATER, TEA LEAVES, MILK, SUGAR, GINGER, CARDAMOM, CLOVES, CINNAMON, FENNEL SEEDS
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 1 cup water in a pot. 2. Add crushed ginger, cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, and fennel seeds. 3. Let the spices infuse for 2-3 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 2 tsp tea leaves and boil for another 2 minutes. 2. Pour in 1 cup milk and sugar to taste. 3. Let the tea simmer for 2 minutes. 4. Strain and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: COFFEE POWDER, WATER, MILK, SUGAR
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil water and pour it into the coffee filter. 2. Add 1-2 tbsp coffee powder to the filter.
Cooking Steps: 1. Let the coffee drip through the filter for 5-7 minutes. 2. In a cup, add boiled milk and sugar to taste. 3. Pour the filtered coffee into the cup and stir. 4. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: YOGURT, WATER, SUGAR, ROSE WATER, ICE
Preparation Steps: 1. In a blender, combine 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup water, and 2 tbsp sugar. 2. Add 1 tsp rose water.
Cooking Steps: 1. Blend until smooth. 2. Add ice cubes and blend again. 3. Serve chilled with a garnish of rose petals or cardamom powder.

INGREDIENTS: YOGURT, WATER, SALT, ROASTED CUMIN POWDER, MINT LEAVES
Preparation Steps: 1. In a blender, combine 1 cup yogurt and 1/2 cup water. 2. Add 1/4 tsp salt and 1/2 tsp roasted cumin powder.
Cooking Steps: 1. Blend until smooth. 2. Garnish with mint leaves. 3. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: YOGURT, WATER, SALT, ROASTED CUMIN POWDER, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: 1. In a blender, mix 1 cup yogurt and 2 cups water. 2. Add salt and roasted cumin powder to taste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Blend until smooth. 2. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves. 3. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: RAW MANGOES, SUGAR, SALT, BLACK SALT, CUMIN POWDER, MINT LEAVES
Preparation Steps: 1. Boil 2 raw mangoes until soft. 2. Peel the mangoes and extract the pulp. 3. Add sugar, salt, black salt, and cumin powder to taste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Blend the pulp with 1 cup water and mint leaves. 2. Serve chilled with ice cubes.

INGREDIENTS: LEMON, WATER, SUGAR, SALT, CUMIN POWDER, MINT LEAVES
Preparation Steps: 1. Squeeze the juice of 2 lemons into a glass. 2. Add 1-2 tsp sugar, a pinch of salt, and cumin powder.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 1 cup water and stir until the sugar dissolves. 2. Garnish with mint leaves and serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: CUMIN, CORIANDER POWDER, GINGER, LEMON, MINT LEAVES, BLACK SALT, SUGAR
Preparation Steps: 1. Roast 1 tsp cumin seeds and grind it into powder. 2. In a glass, add 1 tsp roasted cumin powder, 1/4 tsp coriander powder, ginger, black salt, and sugar.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add 1 tbsp lemon juice, mint leaves, and 1 cup water. 2. Stir well and serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: ALMONDS, CASHEWS, PISTACHIOS, FENNEL SEEDS, PEPPERCORNS, CARDAMOM, SAFFRON, MILK, SUGAR
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 10 almonds, 10 cashews, and 10 pistachios in water for 2-3 hours. 2. Grind them with fennel seeds, peppercorns, cardamom, and saffron to make a paste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Boil 1 cup milk and add the paste along with 1/4 cup sugar. 2. Let it cool and serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: URAD DAL, RICE, GINGER, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, CURRY LEAVES, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup urad dal and 1/4 cup rice for 4-5 hours. 2. Grind the dal and rice mixture into a smooth batter. 3. Add chopped ginger, green chilies, cumin seeds, curry leaves, and salt.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan. Shape the batter into small donuts and fry until golden brown. 2. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: URAD DAL, RICE, YOGURT, CUMIN POWDER, SALT, CORIANDER, TAMARIND CHUTNEY
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup urad dal and 1/4 cup rice for 4-5 hours. 2. Grind the mixture into a smooth batter.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fry the batter into small vadas and soak them in warm water for 5 minutes. 2. Dip the vadas in yogurt and garnish with cumin powder, salt, and tamarind chutney. 3. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, MOONG DAL, GINGER, BLACK PEPPER, CUMIN, CASHEWS, GHEE, CURRY LEAVES
Preparation Steps: 1. Wash 1 cup rice and 1/4 cup moong dal. 2. In a pan, roast the dal for 3-4 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Cook the rice and dal mixture in 3 cups of water. 2. In another pan, heat ghee, add cumin seeds, ginger, black pepper, and curry leaves. 3. Add the tempering to the cooked rice-dal mixture. 4. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: URAD DAL, RICE, GINGER, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, CURRY LEAVES, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak 1 cup urad dal and 1/4 cup rice for 4-5 hours. 2. Grind the mixture into a smooth batter. 3. Add chopped ginger, green chilies, cumin seeds, curry leaves, and salt.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan. Shape the batter into small balls and fry until golden brown. 2. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: YOGURT, CUCUMBER, CARROT, GREEN CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Grate cucumber and carrot. 2. In a bowl, mix the grated vegetables with 1 cup yogurt.
Cooking Steps: 1. In a pan, heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves. 2. Pour the tempering over the yogurt mixture and mix well. 3. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: TAMARIND, CARROT, PEAS, BEANS, POTATO, ONION, SAMBAR POWDER, TURMERIC, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Soak tamarind in water and extract the juice. 2. Cut vegetables like brinjal, okra, and drumsticks into pieces.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and curry leaves. 2. Add the vegetables and cook for 5 minutes. 3. Add tamarind juice, sambar powder, turmeric, and salt. 4. Cook for 10-15 minutes and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: PIZZA DOUGH, TOMATO SAUCE, CHEESE, BELL PEPPERS, OLIVES, MUSHROOMS, ONION, OREGANO, BASIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 220�0.5C. 2. Roll out the pizza dough to your desired thickness. 3. Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
Cooking Steps: 1. Top with cheese, bell peppers, olives, mushrooms, onions, oregano, and basil. 2. Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly. 3. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: PIZZA DOUGH, TOMATO SAUCE, CHEESE, CHICKEN, SAUSAGE, BELL PEPPERS, OLIVES, ONION, OREGANO
Preparation Steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 220�0.5C. 2. Roll out the pizza dough. 3. Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
Cooking Steps: 1. Top with cheese, cooked chicken, sausage, bell peppers, olives, onions, and oregano. 2. Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly. 3. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: PASTA, TOMATO, GARLIC, OLIVE OIL, RED CHILI FLAKES, BASIL, PARMESAN
Preparation Steps: 1. Cook pasta according to the package instructions. 2. Blanch tomatoes and peel off the skin.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat olive oil, sauté garlic, and red chili flakes. 2. Add the tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes. 3. Add cooked pasta and toss. 4. Garnish with basil and parmesan, and serve.

INGREDIENTS: PASTA, BUTTER, GARLIC, CREAM, PARMESAN, SALT, PEPPER
Preparation Steps: 1. Cook pasta according to the package instructions. 2. In a pan, melt butter and saute garlic.
Cooking Steps: 1. Add cream, parmesan, salt, and pepper. 2. Cook until the sauce thickens, then toss in the pasta. 3. Serve hot with extra parmesan.

INGREDIENTS: SPAGHETTI, TOMATO, GARLIC, OLIVE OIL, BASIL, PARMESAN
Preparation Steps: 1. Cook spaghetti according to the package instructions. 2. Blanch and peel the tomatoes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat olive oil, sauté garlic, and add chopped tomatoes. 2. Simmer for 5 minutes, then add the cooked spaghetti. 3. Toss and serve with basil and parmesan.

INGREDIENTS: BURGER BUNS, VEG PATTY, LETTUCE, TOMATO, ONION, CHEESE, KETCHUP, MUSTARD
Preparation Steps: 1. Prepare a veg patty using mashed potatoes, vegetables, and spices. 2. Grill the patty until crispy.
Cooking Steps: 1. Toast the burger buns. 2. Assemble the burger with the patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, ketchup, and mustard. 3. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: BURGER BUNS, CHICKEN PATTY, LETTUCE, TOMATO, ONION, CHEESE, KETCHUP, MAYONNAISE
Preparation Steps: 1. Grill the chicken patty until cooked. 2. Toast the burger buns.
Cooking Steps: 1. Assemble the burger with the chicken patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, ketchup, and mayonnaise. 2. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: MOMO WRAPPERS, CABBAGE, CARROT, ONION, GINGER, GARLIC, SOY SAUCE, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Finely chop cabbage, carrot, onion, and garlic. 2. Saute the vegetables in oil with ginger, garlic, and soy sauce.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fill the momo wrappers with the filling. 2. Steam the momos for 10-15 minutes. 3. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: MOMO WRAPPERS, GROUND CHICKEN, ONION, GARLIC, GINGER, SOY SAUCE, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Mix ground chicken with chopped onion, garlic, ginger, and soy sauce. 2. Prepare the momo wrappers.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fill the momo wrappers with the chicken mixture. 2. Steam the momos for 10-15 minutes. 3. Serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Peel and cut potatoes into thin strips. 2. Soak them in water for 15-20 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and fry the potatoes until crispy and golden. 2. Sprinkle with salt and serve.

INGREDIENTS: BREAD, GARLIC, BUTTER, PARSLEY, CHEESE
Preparation Steps: 1. Preheat the oven to 180�0.5C. 2. Mix softened butter, garlic, parsley, and cheese.
Cooking Steps: 1. Spread the garlic butter mixture on the bread slices. 2. Bake for 5-7 minutes until golden and serve.

INGREDIENTS: NOODLES, CABBAGE, CARROT, BELL PEPPERS, SOY SAUCE, VINEGAR, GARLIC, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Cook noodles according to the package instructions. 2. Chop the vegetables into thin strips.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a wok, sauté garlic, and vegetables. 2. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and cooked noodles. 3. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: CABBAGE, CARROT, CORN FLOUR, SOY SAUCE, GINGER, GARLIC, SPRING ONION, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Grate cabbage and carrot. 2. Mix them with corn flour, soy sauce, and spices to form a dough.
Cooking Steps: 1. Shape into small balls and deep fry until golden. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté ginger and garlic, and add the fried balls. 3. Toss in the sauce, and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: PANEER, BELL PEPPERS, ONION, SOY SAUCE, CORN FLOUR, GREEN CHILIES, GARLIC, GINGER, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Cut paneer into cubes and coat with corn flour. 2. Chop vegetables and garlic.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fry the paneer cubes until crispy. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic, ginger, and vegetables. 3. Add soy sauce and toss the fried paneer. 4. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: CHICKEN, BELL PEPPERS, ONION, SOY SAUCE, CORN FLOUR, GREEN CHILIES, GARLIC, GINGER, OIL
Preparation Steps: 1. Marinate chicken with soy sauce, corn flour, and spices. 2. Chop vegetables.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fry the chicken until crispy. 2. Heat oil, sauté garlic, ginger, and vegetables. 3. Add soy sauce and toss the chicken. 4. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: SUSHI RICE, NORI SHEETS, FISH, CUCUMBER, AVOCADO, SOY SAUCE, VINEGAR
Preparation Steps: 1. Cook sushi rice and mix with vinegar. 2. Slice fish, cucumber, and avocado into thin strips.
Cooking Steps: 1. Place nori sheets on a mat, spread rice, and add fish, cucumber, and avocado. 2. Roll tightly and cut into pieces. 3. Serve with soy sauce.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, SPINACH, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT,CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Peel and cube potatoes. Wash and chop spinach.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, and add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Stir well. 4. Add potatoes and cook for 5 minutes. 5. Add spinach and cook until tender. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: GREEN PEAS, MUSHROOMS, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT,CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Chop mushrooms and onions. Keep peas ready.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, and add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Stir well. 4. Add mushrooms and cook until soft. 5. Add peas, mix well, and cook for another 5 minutes. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: PANEER, ONION, TOMATO, YOGURT, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, CORIANDER, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT,CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Cut paneer into cubes. Prepare marinade using yogurt, spices, and a little salt. Marinate paneer for 15 minutes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, and add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add turmeric, red chili powder, coriander, garam masala, and salt. Mix well. 4. Add marinated paneer cubes and cook for 5-7 minutes. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: SMALL EGGPLANTS, ONION, TOMATO, GARLIC, GINGER, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, CORIANDER POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT,CORIANDER, OIL
Preparation Steps: Slit the eggplants lengthwise, keeping the stems intact. Prepare the stuffing by mixing chopped onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, green chilies, and spices.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, and add the stuffing mixture. Stir and cook for 5 minutes. 2. Stuff the eggplants with the prepared mixture. 3. Heat oil in a pan, and cook stuffed eggplants on low heat, turning occasionally until they become tender and the stuffing is cooked. 4. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, YOGURT, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT,CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Peel and cube potatoes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, and add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. 2. Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well. 3. Add cubed potatoes and cook for 10 minutes. 4. Add beaten yogurt and cook for another 5 minutes. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: TINDA, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Peel and cut tinda into small pieces.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds and sauté until they splutter. 2. Add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. Sauté until onions turn golden. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften. 4. Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Stir well. 5. Add tinda and cook on medium heat until they are soft and tender, stirring occasionally. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, BELL PEPPERS, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Peel and cube the potatoes. Cut capsicum into small pieces.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds and sauté. 2. Add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. Sauté until onions turn golden. 3. Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well. 4. Add cubed potatoes and sauté for 5-7 minutes. 5. Add chopped capsicum and cook for another 5 minutes until both vegetables are tender. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: BHINDI, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Wash and cut okra into small pieces.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté cumin seeds until fragrant. 2. Add chopped onions, green chilies, and ginger. Sauté until onions turn golden. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften. 4. Add turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well. 5. Add okra and cook on medium heat until they are crisp and tender, stirring occasionally. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: CHICKPEAS, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, CORIANDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Soak chickpeas overnight and cook them in a pressure cooker until tender.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds and sauté. 2. Add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. Sauté until onions turn golden. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften. 4. Add turmeric, red chili powder, coriander, and garam masala. Mix well. 5. Add cooked chickpeas, salt, and a little water to make the gravy. Simmer for 10 minutes. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: GRAM FLOUR, YOGURT, ONION, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT, GARAM MASALA, CORIANDER, OIL
Preparation Steps: Make pakoras by mixing gram flour, water, salt, turmeric, red chili powder, and chopped onions. Shape into small balls and fry until golden.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds. Once they splutter, add ginger, garlic, and sauté. 2. Add yogurt, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well. 3. Add water and bring it to a boil. Simmer for 10 minutes. 4. Add the fried pakoras and cook for another 5 minutes. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: SWEET POTATO, POTATO, YAM, GREEN BEANS, EGGPLANT, FENUGREEK LEAVES, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, MUSTARD SEEDS, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, CORIANDER POWDER, ASAFOETIDA, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Cut all vegetables into cubes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and asafoetida. 2. Add ginger, garlic, and green chilies. Sauté for a minute. 3. Add chopped vegetables and sauté for 5 minutes. 4. Add spices (turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, coriander powder, salt). Stir well. 5. Add water, cover, and cook on low heat until vegetables are tender. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: BITTER GOURD, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Wash and slice bitter gourd. Sprinkle salt on it and set aside for 15 minutes to reduce bitterness.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, green chilies, and ginger. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well. 4. Add bitter gourd slices and cook on low heat until tender. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: CARROT, POTATO, BEANS, PEAS, CAULIFLOWER, COCONUT MILK, GINGER, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, MUSTARD SEEDS, TURMERIC, SALT, FRESH CURRY LEAVES, COCONUT OIL
Preparation Steps: Cut vegetables into small cubes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat coconut oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and curry leaves. Sauté for a minute. 2. Add chopped ginger and green chilies. Sauté for another minute. 3. Add vegetables and sauté for 2 minutes. 4. Add water and bring to a boil. Cook until vegetables are tender. 5. Add coconut milk and salt, and cook for another 5 minutes. 6. Garnish with curry leaves and serve with appam or rice.

INGREDIENTS: SOYA CHUNKS, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Soak soya chunks in hot water for 15 minutes, then drain.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, and add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. 4. Add soya chunks and mix well. 5. Add water, cover, and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: EGGPLANT, POTATO, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Peel and cube potatoes. Cut eggplant into chunks.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds and add chopped onions, ginger, garlic, and green chilies. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften. 3. Add turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well. 4. Add potatoes and eggplant, sauté for 5 minutes. 5. Add water, cover, and cook until the vegetables are tender. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: SABUDANA, POTATO, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, PEANUTS, LEMON, CORIANDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: Soak sabudana in water for 4-6 hours. Peel and chop potatoes into small cubes. Dry roast peanuts and crush them into small pieces.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, and let them splutter. 2. Add chopped green chilies and sauté for 1-2 minutes. 3. Add chopped potatoes and cook for 5 minutes until they become soft. 4. Add soaked sabudana and groundnuts, stir well, and cook for 5-7 minutes. 5. Season with salt and cook until the sabudana turns translucent. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and squeeze lemon juice over the khichdi. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: RAGI FLOUR, RICE FLOUR, WATER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Prepare the batter by mixing ragi flour, rice flour, salt, and water until a smooth batter forms.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle and pour a ladle of batter onto it. 2. Spread the batter evenly in a circular motion to form a thin dosa. 3. Drizzle oil around the edges of the dosa and cook for 2-3 minutes until the bottom turns golden brown. 4. Flip the dosa and cook the other side for 1-2 minutes. 5. Serve hot with chutney or sambar.

INGREDIENTS: RICE FLOUR, COCONUT MILK, YEAST, SUGAR, SALT, WATER
Preparation Steps: Prepare the batter by mixing rice flour, coconut milk, sugar, and yeast. Let the batter rest for 4-6 hours to ferment.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat an appam pan and pour a ladle of the batter in the center. 2. Swirl the pan to spread the batter thinly around the edges. 3. Cover and cook for 2-3 minutes until the center of the appam is soft and spongy. 4. Remove from the pan and serve hot with vegetable stew or curry.

INGREDIENTS: RICE FLOUR, GRATED COCONUT, SALT, WATER
Preparation Steps: Mix rice flour, grated coconut, and salt in a bowl. Gradually add water to form a dough.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fill a puttu maker with layers of dough and grated coconut. 2. Steam the dough in the puttu maker for 10-12 minutes until it cooks through. 3. Serve the steamed puttu hot with banana, sugar, or curry.

INGREDIENTS: RICE FLOUR,WATER, SALT, COCONUT MILK
Preparation Steps: Prepare the dough by mixing rice flour, salt, and hot water. Knead into a smooth dough. Press the dough into idiyappam maker.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fill the idiyappam maker with the dough and press it onto a steaming tray. 2. Steam for 8-10 minutes until the idiyappams are cooked through. 3. Serve with coconut milk or curry.

INGREDIENTS: CHANA DAL, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, CUMIN, TURMERIC, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Soak chana dal for 2 hours. Drain and grind into a coarse paste with green chilies, ginger, and spices.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds, and sauté them until they splutter. 2. Add chopped onions and sauté until they soften. 3. Add the chana dal paste along with turmeric, salt, and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Once the mixture thickens, pour it onto a hot griddle and spread it to form pancakes. 5. Cook both sides until golden brown. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: SEMOLINA, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, MUSTARD SEEDS, URAD DAL, CHANA DAL, CURRY LEAVES, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Roast rava in a pan until golden brown. Chop onions and tomatoes into small pieces.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter. 2. Add urad dal, chana dal, green chilies, and sauté for 1-2 minutes. 3. Add chopped onions and tomatoes, cook until soft. 4. Add water and salt, bring to a boil. 5. Add roasted rava, mix well, and cook until the water is absorbed and the upma thickens. 6. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: SPROUTED MOONG, POTATO, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, CORIANDER, TURMERIC, GARAM MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT, PAV, LEMON, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Soak and sprout moong beans for 2 days. Boil potatoes and chop them into small cubes.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, chopped ginger, garlic, onions, and green chilies until golden brown. 2. Add chopped tomatoes, cook until soft. 3. Add spices like turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt, and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Add sprouted moong, boiled potatoes, and water. Let it cook for 10 minutes to bring the flavors together. 5. Serve with pav, garnished with lemon juice and fresh coriander.

INGREDIENTS: OATS, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Chop onions, tomatoes, and green chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté cumin seeds, green chilies, onions, and tomatoes for 2-3 minutes. 2. Add spices like turmeric, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt, and cook for 3-4 minutes. 3. Add oats, water, and salt, cook for 5-7 minutes until oats are cooked. 4. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: BREAD, POTATO, CUCUMBER, TOMATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, CORIANDER CHUTNEY, SALT, PEPPER, LEMON
Preparation Steps: Boil and mash potatoes. Slice cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, and green chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Apply coriander chutney on one side of the bread slices. 2. Layer mashed potatoes, cucumber, tomato, onion, and green chilies on one slice. 3. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and squeeze lemon juice on top. 4. Place another bread slice on top and toast if desired.

INGREDIENTS: PAPAD, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, CORIANDER, CHAAT MASALA, LEMON
Preparation Steps: Chop onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and coriander. Prepare chaat masala mix.
Cooking Steps: 1. Roast or fry the papad until crisp. 2. Top with chopped onions, tomatoes, green chilies, coriander, chaat masala, and a squeeze of lemon juice. 3. Serve immediately as a crunchy snack or appetizer.

INGREDIENTS: GRAM FLOUR, YOGURT, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, SUGAR, LEMON, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Prepare the batter by mixing gram flour, yogurt, water, green chilies, ginger, and salt until smooth.
Cooking Steps: 1. Steam the batter in a steamer for 15-20 minutes until cooked through. 2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté mustard seeds and curry leaves. 3. Pour the tempering over the steamed dhokla. 4. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: GRAM FLOUR, YOGURT, GINGER, GREEN CHILIES, TURMERIC, CUMIN, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, SALT, CORIANDER
Preparation Steps: Prepare a smooth batter by mixing gram flour, yogurt, water, and salt.
Cooking Steps: 1. Cook the batter in a pan over low heat until it thickens and starts to leave the sides of the pan. 2. Spread the thick batter on a flat surface and let it cool. 3. Once cool, roll the batter into tight cylindrical shapes. 4. Heat oil in a pan, sauté mustard seeds, cumin seeds, and curry leaves, and pour the tempering over the khandvi rolls. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with chutney.

INGREDIENTS: SPRING ROLL WRAPPERS, CABBAGE, CARROT, BEANS, ONION, GARLIC, SOY SAUCE, SALT, PEPPER, OIL
Preparation Steps: Finely chop cabbage, carrots, beans, and onions. Prepare a stir-fry mixture with garlic and soy sauce.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and onions. 2. Add the vegetables and cook until soft. 3. Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper, and cook for a few more minutes. 4. Let the mixture cool. 5. Place a spoonful of the filling in a spring roll wrapper and roll it tightly. 6. Fry the spring rolls in hot oil until golden and crispy. 7. Serve hot with dipping sauce.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, BREAD CRUMBS, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARAM MASALA, CORIANDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Boil and mash potatoes. Finely chop onions, green chilies, and coriander.
Cooking Steps: 1. In a bowl, mix mashed potatoes with onions, green chilies, ginger, garam masala, salt, and bread crumbs. 2. Shape the mixture into small patties. 3. Heat oil in a pan and fry the patties until golden brown on both sides. 4. Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, CHEESE, CORN FLOUR, SALT, PEPPER, OIL
Preparation Steps: Boil and mash potatoes. Grate cheese.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix mashed potatoes with cheese, salt, and pepper. 2. Shape into small balls and roll them in cornflour. 3. Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the cheese balls until golden brown. 4. Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

INGREDIENTS: PANEER, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, CUMIN, CORIANDER, GARAM MASALA, CORIANDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: Grate mixed vegetables. Crumble cottage cheese and finely chop onions and green chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix grated vegetables, crumbled cottage cheese, chopped onions, green chilies, and spices into a dough. 2. Shape the mixture around skewers and cook them in a preheated oven or grill until golden and cooked through. 3. Serve hot with green chutney.

INGREDIENTS: MINCED MUTTON, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER, GARLIC, CUMIN, GARAM MASALA, CORIANDER, CORIANDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: Grind mutton with ginger, garlic, onions, and spices into a smooth mixture.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix the ground mutton with chopped green chilies, coriander, spices, and salt. 2. Shape the mixture into kebabs and skewer them. 3. Grill the kebabs until they are cooked through and golden brown. 4. Serve hot with chutney or naan.

INGREDIENTS: CHICKEN WINGS, GINGER-GARLIC PASTE, SOY SAUCE, VINEGAR, CORN FLOUR, SALT, PEPPER, OIL
Preparation Steps: Marinate chicken wings with ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Cooking Steps: 1. Coat the marinated chicken wings with cornflour. 2. Heat oil in a pan and deep fry the chicken lollipops until golden and crispy. 3. Serve hot with dipping sauce or chutney.

INGREDIENTS: PANEER, YOGURT, GINGER-GARLIC PASTE, LEMON, GARAM MASALA, CUMIN, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Cut paneer into cubes and prepare a marinade with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, and spices.
Cooking Steps: 1. Marinate the paneer cubes in the mixture for at least 30 minutes. 2. Skewer the marinated paneer and grill it until golden brown and cooked through. 3. Serve hot with green chutney and lemon wedges.

INGREDIENTS: MUSHROOMS, ONION, BELL PEPPERS, GARLIC, SOY SAUCE, VINEGAR, SALT, PEPPER, OIL
Preparation Steps: Slice mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers. Mince garlic.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a wok, sauté garlic, onions, and bell peppers. 2. Add mushrooms, soy sauce, vinegar, salt, and pepper. 3. Stir fry for 5-7 minutes until the mushrooms are cooked and the sauce thickens. 4. Serve hot with rice or noodles.

INGREDIENTS: CORN KERNELS, FLOUR, GREEN CHILIES, ONION, CORIANDER, CUMIN, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Grind corn kernels coarsely. Finely chop onions, green chilies, and coriander.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix ground corn with flour, chopped onions, green chilies, coriander, cumin seeds, and salt. 2. Shape into small fritters. 3. Heat oil in a pan and fry the fritters until golden brown. 4. Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

INGREDIENTS: PAV, ONION, TOMATO, CUCUMBER, CHEESE, CHUTNEY, SALT, PEPPER
Preparation Steps: Chop onions, tomatoes, and cucumber. Slice cheese.
Cooking Steps: 1. Slice the pav rolls and spread chutney on both sides. 2. Layer with sliced onion, tomato, cucumber, and cheese. 3. Sprinkle salt and pepper. 4. Close the sandwich and serve.

INGREDIENTS: TAMARIND, TOMATO, GARLIC, GREEN CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, CORIANDER, SALT, PEPPER, WATER
Preparation Steps: Soak tamarind in water and extract juice. Chop tomatoes and garlic.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pot, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, garlic, and green chilies. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes. 3. Add tamarind juice, water, salt, and pepper, and bring to a boil. 4. Simmer for 5-7 minutes and garnish with coriander. Serve hot with rice.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, TOMATO, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, GINGER-GARLIC PASTE, CUMIN, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Cook rice and chop tomatoes and onions. Prepare ginger-garlic paste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions, green chilies, and ginger-garlic paste. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add spices like cumin, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. 4. Add cooked rice and mix well. Cook for 5 minutes, garnish with coriander. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: YOGURT, CUCUMBER, COCONUT, GREEN CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Grate cucumber and prepare coconut paste. Soak mustard seeds in water.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix yogurt with grated cucumber and coconut paste. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, and sauté for 1-2 minutes. 3. Pour the tempering over the yogurt mixture. 4. Serve as a side dish with rice or roti.

INGREDIENTS: TAMARIND, ONION, TOMATO, GARLIC, RED CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, CUMIN, CORIANDER, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: Soak tamarind and extract juice. Chop onions, tomatoes, and garlic.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté mustard seeds, curry leaves, garlic, and onions. 2. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add tamarind juice, spices, and water. 4. Let the gravy simmer for 10-12 minutes. Serve hot with rice or roti.

INGREDIENTS: BANANAS, SALT, TURMERIC, OIL
Preparation Steps: Peel bananas and slice them thinly. Prepare a turmeric solution.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Dip the banana slices in turmeric water and fry in hot oil until crispy and golden. 3. Drain excess oil and sprinkle salt. Serve as a snack.

INGREDIENTS: TOOR DAL, GREEN BEANS, ONION, GREEN CHILIES, MUSTARD SEEDS, CURRY LEAVES, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Soak toor dal for 1 hour. Chop onions and green chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Cook soaked toor dal until soft. 2. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, onions, and green chilies. 3. Add cooked dal and green beans. Cook for 5-7 minutes, add salt, and mix well. 4. Serve hot with rice or roti.

INGREDIENTS: CABBAGE, COCONUT, MUSTARD SEEDS, URAD DAL, GREEN CHILIES, SALT, OIL
Preparation Steps: Chop cabbage and green chilies. Grate coconut.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and urad dal. 2. Add chopped cabbage and sauté for 5-7 minutes. 3. Add grated coconut, green chilies, and salt. Cook for 2-3 minutes. 4. Serve hot with rice or roti.

INGREDIENTS: RICE FLOUR, MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, SAFFRON, ALMONDS, PISTACHIOS
Preparation Steps: Soak rice flour in milk for 30 minutes. Grind almonds and pistachios.
Cooking Steps: 1. Boil milk and add sugar. 2. Mix soaked rice flour into the boiling milk, stirring continuously. 3. Add cardamom and saffron, cook until the mixture thickens. 4. Garnish with ground almonds and pistachios. 5. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: FULL_CREAM MILK, SUGAR, GHEE, CARDAMOM, CASHEWS, ALMONDS, PISTACHIOS
Preparation Steps: Boil milk and reduce it to a thick consistency. Prepare nuts for garnish.
Cooking Steps: 1. Boil milk in a heavy pan until it thickens. 2. Add sugar, ghee, and cardamom. 3. Stir continuously to prevent burning. 4. Once it reaches a dough-like consistency, shape into pedas and garnish with chopped nuts. 5. Serve warm or at room temperature.

INGREDIENTS: PANEER, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, ROSE WATER, SAFFRON, PISTACHIOS
Preparation Steps: Grate paneer and mix with sugar and cardamom.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat the grated paneer and sugar in a pan until it thickens. 2. Add cardamom and rose water for flavor. 3. Shape the mixture into small discs or mold shapes. 4. Garnish with saffron and pistachios. 5. Let it cool and serve.

INGREDIENTS: SUGAR, FLOUR, GHEE, CARDAMOM, PISTACHIOS, ALMONDS
Preparation Steps: Sift flour and cardamom powder. Prepare a ghee-flavored syrup.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat ghee in a pan, add flour, and cook until it turns golden brown. 2. In another pan, make a syrup by boiling sugar and water. 3. Mix the syrup with flour, stirring constantly until it forms a soft dough. 4. Shape into pieces and garnish with pistachios and almonds. 5. Let it cool and serve.

INGREDIENTS: FLOUR, GHEE, SUGAR, SAFFRON, ROSE WATER, CARDAMOM, ALMONDS, PISTACHIOS
Preparation Steps: Prepare a batter using flour and ghee. Soak saffron in milk.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat ghee in a deep pan and slowly pour in the batter to form a ring shape. 2. Fry the ghevar until it turns golden and crisp. 3. Make a sugar syrup with sugar, rose water, and cardamom. 4. Dip the fried ghevar into the syrup and garnish with saffron and nuts. 5. Serve cooled.

INGREDIENTS: GRAM FLOUR, SUGAR, GHEE, CARDAMOM, ALMONDS, CASHEWS
Preparation Steps: Roast gram flour in ghee. Prepare sugar syrup with cardamom.
Cooking Steps: 1. Roast the gram flour in ghee until it turns golden. 2. Prepare a sugar syrup with sugar, water, and cardamom. 3. Mix the syrup with the roasted flour and cook until it thickens. 4. Pour the mixture into a greased tray and set. 5. Garnish with chopped almonds and cashews. 6. Let it cool and cut into pieces.

INGREDIENTS: PANEER, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, RAISINS, NUTS
Preparation Steps: Prepare fresh paneer or use store-bought. Soak raisins.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix paneer with sugar, cardamom, and soaked raisins. 2. Shape the mixture into a round form and bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 20 minutes. 3. Once golden, remove and let it cool. 4. Garnish with chopped nuts. 5. Serve in slices.

INGREDIENTS: MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, GHEE, PANEER, ALMONDS
Preparation Steps: Boil milk and reduce it to a thick consistency. Crumble paneer.
Cooking Steps: 1. Boil the milk and reduce it to half. 2. Add sugar and crumbled paneer to the milk. 3. Cook on low heat until it thickens. 4. Grease a tray with ghee and pour the mixture into it. 5. Let it cool and set. 6. Garnish with chopped almonds. 7. Cut into pieces and serve.

INGREDIENTS: VERMICELLI, MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, RAISINS, CASHEWS, ALMONDS
Preparation Steps: Roast seviyan in ghee. Chop nuts and soak raisins.
Cooking Steps: 1. Roast the seviyan in ghee until golden brown. 2. Boil milk and add sugar. 3. Add the roasted seviyan and cook until the milk thickens. 4. Add cardamom, raisins, and chopped nuts. 5. Let it simmer for a few minutes, then serve warm or chilled.

INGREDIENTS: RICE, MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, CASHEWS, ALMONDS, RAISINS
Preparation Steps: Soak rice for 30 minutes. Roast nuts.
Cooking Steps: 1. Cook rice in milk until soft. 2. Add sugar, cardamom, and cook until the milk thickens. 3. Add roasted nuts and raisins. 4. Simmer for a few minutes and serve warm or chilled.

INGREDIENTS: MUTTON, ONION, TOMATO, GINGER, GARLIC, PAV, CUMIN, GARAM MASALA, CHILI POWDER, CORIANDER, SALT
Preparation Steps: Chop onions, tomatoes, and garlic. Prepare ginger-garlic paste.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. 2. Add minced meat and cook until browned. 3. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Add spices and cook until the oil separates. 5. Toast pav buns and serve with the keema mixture.

INGREDIENTS: EGGS, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, TURMERIC, RED CHILI POWDER, GARAM MASALA, PAV
Preparation Steps: Chop onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. Prepare spices.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and green chilies. 2. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add spices and crack eggs into the mixture. 4. Scramble the eggs and cook until done. 5. Toast pav buns and serve the Anda Bhurji inside.

INGREDIENTS: BREAD, POTATO, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, CHAAT MASALA, RED CHILI POWDER, BUTTER
Preparation Steps: Boil and mash potatoes. Chop onions, tomatoes, and chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix mashed potatoes with chopped onions, tomatoes, and spices. 2. Spread butter on bread slices and apply the potato mixture. 3. Toast the bread on a pan until golden. 4. Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

INGREDIENTS: EGGS, PARATHA, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, CHAAT MASALA, GARAM MASALA, SAUCE
Preparation Steps: Prepare parathas. Chop onions, tomatoes, and chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Heat oil in a pan and scramble the eggs with spices. 2. Place the scrambled eggs on a paratha, top with onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. 3. Roll it up and serve hot with sauce.

INGREDIENTS: CHICKEN, YOGURT, LEMON, GARLIC, CUMIN, PAPRIKA, TURMERIC, CORIANDER, PITA BREAD
Preparation Steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, and spices.
Cooking Steps: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, and spices for 2 hours. 2. Grill or roast the chicken until cooked through. 3. Slice the chicken and serve in pita bread with veggies and sauces.

Preparation Steps: Prepare parathas. Chop onions, tomatoes, and chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Sauté paneer with onions, tomatoes, and spices. 2. Place the mixture in a paratha and roll it up. 3. Serve hot with sauce or chutney.

INGREDIENTS: PARATHA, CHICKEN, ONION, TOMATO, GREEN CHILIES, CHAAT MASALA, GARAM MASALA, SAUCE
Preparation Steps: Prepare parathas. Chop onions, tomatoes, and chilies.
Cooking Steps: 1. Cook chicken with onions, tomatoes, and spices. 2. Place the chicken mixture in a paratha and roll it up. 3. Serve with sauce or chutney.

INGREDIENTS: LASAGNA SHEETS, TOMATO SAUCE, SPINACH, MUSHROOMS, CHEESE, GARLIC, ONION, OLIVE OIL
Preparation Steps: Prepare tomato sauce. Chop vegetables.
Cooking Steps: 1. Boil lasagna sheets. 2. Prepare the tomato sauce with garlic, onion, and spices. 3. Layer the lasagna with tomato sauce, vegetables, and cheese. 4. Bake in the oven until golden and bubbly. 5. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: LASAGNA SHEETS, CHICKEN, TOMATO SAUCE, CHEESE, GARLIC, ONION, OLIVE OIL
Preparation Steps: Prepare chicken filling. Chop garlic and onion.
Cooking Steps: 1. Boil lasagna sheets and prepare the chicken filling with tomato sauce and spices. 2. Layer the lasagna with chicken, tomato sauce, and cheese. 3. Bake in the oven until golden. 4. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: POTATO, CORN FLOUR, SOY SAUCE, CHILI SAUCE, GARLIC, GREEN CHILIES, ONION, VINEGAR
Preparation Steps: Boil and fry potatoes. Prepare sauce mixture.
Cooking Steps: 1. Fry the boiled potatoes until crispy. 2. Sauté garlic, green chilies, and onions. 3. Add the fried potatoes and toss with soy sauce, chili sauce, and vinegar. 4. Serve hot.

INGREDIENTS: MANGO, MILK, SUGAR, ICE CREAM
Preparation Steps: Peel and chop mangoes. Blend ingredients.
Cooking Steps: 1. Blend mangoes with milk, sugar, and ice cream until smooth. 2. Serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: ROSE SYRUP, MILK, SUGAR, ICE
Preparation Steps: Mix rose syrup with milk. Add sugar if desired.
Cooking Steps: 1. Mix rose syrup with milk and sugar. 2. Add ice cubes and serve chilled.

INGREDIENTS: ALMONDS, MILK, SUGAR, CARDAMOM, SAFFRON
Preparation Steps: Soak almonds overnight. Blend almonds and milk.
Cooking Steps: 1. Soak almonds overnight and grind into a paste. 2. Heat milk and add the almond paste, sugar, cardamom, and saffron. 3. Boil for a few minutes and serve warm.

INGREDIENTS: FALOODA SEV, ROSE SYRUP, MILK, ICE CREAM, BASIL SEEDS
Preparation Steps: Soak basil seeds. Prepare falooda sev.
Cooking Steps: 1. Boil falooda sev and soak basil seeds. 2. In a glass, layer falooda sev, rose syrup, and milk. 3. Add ice cream and basil seeds. 4. Serve chilled.
